text: this is the anointed one, whom the Most High has kept to the end 12:32 The words in brackets are added from the Syriac. [of days, who will spring up out of the seed of David, and he will come and speak] to them and reprove them for their wickedness and unrighteousness, and will12:32 The Syriac has set in order. heap up before them their contemptuous dealings.
